SEARCH
Package se.yrgo.utilities

Class DiceGameLogic

java.lang.Object
se.yrgo.utilities.DiceGameLogic
public class DiceGameLogic extends Object
Handles logic like result checking for the dice game. It checks the results of your dice throws and gives points. All the fields and methods are static, as there aren't meant to be multiple instances of this class.

By Vanya

  • Method Details

    • checkResult

      public static void checkResult(Player currentPlayer, List<Dice> diceSet)
      Checks the result of the player's throw and awards points accordingly. Once a die has contributed to award a point, it is removed from the list so it cannot award more points.

      Example: If you get ONE-TWO-THREE-FOUR-FIVE-ONE, you will get 600 points for a short straight + a ONE. Even though you got 2 ONES, you only get points for the ONE that wasn't part of the short straight.

      By Vanya

      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - the player who threw the dice. This player earns the points.
      diceSet - The list of dice to be checked.

    • resetDiceSet

      public static void resetDiceSet(List<Dice> diceSet)
      Resets diceSet in preparation of the next round. Since CheckResult() removes dice, this is needed.

      By Vanya

      Parameters:
      diceSet - The list of dice to be checked.

    • hasStraight

      public static boolean hasStraight(List<Dice> diceSet, List<DiceSides> sidesToLookFor)
      Checks if a list of dice contains a Short Straight, Long Straight, or a Flush.

      By Vanya

      Parameters:
      diceSet - The list of dice to be checked.
      sidesToLookFor - a list of DiceSides to look for.
      Returns:
      true if all the sides in sidesToLookFor are in diceSet, otherwise false.

    • hasThreeOrMoreInARow

      public static Dice hasThreeOrMoreInARow(List<Dice> diceSet, int target)
      Analyzes diceSet and checks if it contains X-in-a-row.

      By Vanya

      Parameters:
      diceSet - The list of dice to be checked.
      target - What to look for. 3 checks for 3-in-a-row, 4 checks for 4-in-a-row etc
      Returns:
      Returns the dice that has the X-in-a-row. Otherwise, returns null.

    • removeDice

      public static void removeDice(List<DiceSides> diceToRemove, List<Dice> diceSet)
      Takes a list of DiceSides, and removes all dice in diceSet that contain that side.

      By Vanya

      Parameters:
      diceToRemove - A list that contains the sides to remove.
      diceSet - The list of dice to be checked.

    • clearScreen

      public static void clearScreen()
      Clears the terminal screen when switching menus. Does nothing in IDE terminals.

      By Vanya

    • slowText

      public static void slowText(String text)
      Takes a string and prints it letter by letter for prettier output.

      By Vanya

      Parameters:
      text - The string to be printed.
